name: T-Shirt Boxes
heading: Custom T-Shirt Boxes
tagline: Perfectly tailored boxes for your t-shirts
shortDescription: Custom boxes designed specifically for t-shirts, ensuring they remain wrinkle-free and presentable.

longDescription.title: Durable Material
longDescription.description: Made from high-quality cardboard to protect your t-shirts.

longDescription.title: Customizable Sizes
longDescription.description: Available in various sizes to fit different t-shirt styles.

longDescription.title: Eco-Friendly Options
longDescription.description: Sustainable materials available for environmentally conscious brands.

longDescription.title: Branding Opportunities
longDescription.description: Can be printed with your brand logo and design for a professional look.

longDescription.title: Easy Assembly
longDescription.description: Designed for quick and easy assembly, saving you time during packaging.

name: Hoodie Boxes
heading: Custom Hoodie Boxes
tagline: Spacious and sturdy boxes for your hoodies
shortDescription: Specially designed boxes for hoodies, providing ample space and protection

longDescription.title: Spacious Design
longDescription.description: Designed to accommodate bulky hoodies without crushing them.

longDescription.title: Customizable Printing
longDescription.description: Can be printed with vibrant colors and designs to match your brand.

longDescription.title: Reinforced Structure
longDescription.description: Built to withstand shipping and handling, ensuring your hoodies arrive in perfect condition.

longDescription.title: Easy to Stack
longDescription.description: Designed for easy stacking and storage, saving space in your warehouse.

longDescription.title: Quick Assembly
longDescription.description: Simple design allows for quick assembly, speeding up your packaging process.
